name: Infin1ty
description:
Infin1ty is a small experimental infinite runner game that was made as a jam game. Our mascot, Binary, is running across the universe on an infinitely generating runway. Control him as he runs and dodge the approaching obstacles by switching between the floor and the ceiling.

GAME CONTROLS PC:

Use the mouse left-click or a keyboard SPACE key to jump.

Mobile:

Tap the screen to jump.

DOWNLOAD & INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS: PC:

Download and extract the zip file, then run Infin1ty.exe

MUSIC:

Main track: Motivation from Action Game Music Pack
SFX:  Casual Game SFX pack
